comment.author: 79526121@N02
comment._content: Wow! This photo is absolutely incredible for its time - I would have never guessed that this was taken in 1948!

comment.author: 48094458@N00
comment._content: Blizzard with sleet and freezing rain from Chicago east, first few days of 1948.   Followed 2' blizzard in NY & NE, Christmas and Boxing Day '47.   I'll take the snow and ice.
